caption_text:
What if your rage was sacred?

Temple of the Burning Heart is a weekend retreat for femme-identifying beings ready to reclaim rage as fuel for healing, truth, and transformation.

Through ritual, movement, and plant medicine, we gather to remember: our emotions are not our weakness—they’re our wisdom.

🌿 Franklin, NY | Jan 29–Feb 1
🌀 Limited capacity. Early bird ends soon.
🔗 Learn more + apply via link in bio.
